history.proof: intros a p HOL. induction p. - apply ltPO. - srun best use: ltP_hd, olist_pX_order unfold: pX.

original: intros a p HOL. induction p. - simpl. apply ltPO. - apply (ltP_tl x a p p0). apply eqT_refl. apply HOL. apply IHp.
